name: Robo Clash
description:
ROBO CLASH

You are a robot, designed to hunt enemies. However, your AI determines that you would do your job better if you had flesh. So, you decide to kill the flesh monsters invading Earth to gather the flesh you need to become a cyborg. Will people think that you have gained free will and tried to save Earth? Or will they know that you are trying to improve your AI.

CONTROLS

WASD, Arrow keys: MOVEMENT

E and Q to rotate player

Click to shoot

Move mouse to adjust camera
